title: About Me
subtitle: Who is behind the code
description: I started in 2016 and since then I've worked in insurance, fintech, marketplaces, and SaaS. I work closely with design, backend, and product because I believe that good frontend understands the whole system. I don't just write beautiful codeâ€”I'm involved in architecture, design systems, testing, accessibility, and performance. Basically, everything that makes the difference between "it works on my machine" and "it has been working in production for two years without any critical bugs."
